String.string: Report to Fraya at Allemantheia Headquarters. [Speak with {@linkcreature:72#1103#Arshadh} to enter.]
Travel to Acarum in Westonia and speak with Harule.
Ask a few of Acarum's citizens and Kaidun's former soldiers about Kaidun.
"What if we investigate the bodies of Kaidun's army?"
Eliminate the Sihran fighters and berserkers in Daunting Pass.
Investigate the corpses of Kaidun soldiers at Daunting Pass.
Bring the gems from the corpses of Kaidun's soldiers to Harule in Acarum.
Go to Harule in Acarum and ask how to lift {@linkcreature:32#16#Ghufran}'s curse.
Bring the gems from the corpses of Kaidun's soldiers to Nania at Holdouts' Redoubt.
Bring the gems from the corpses of Kaidun's soldiers to Nania at Holdouts' Redoubt.
Get the jellied decursive from Nania.
Find Ghufran in the mercenary camp near Holdouts' Redoubt. Use the jellied decursive when his HP is at 30% to break Thulsa's control, then escort him safely to Holdouts' Redoubt.
Go to the Holdouts' Redoubt and ask Ghufran what happened to Kaidun.
Eliminate the false Kaidun in his hillside fortress.
Bring the head of the traitor back to Nania.
Bring the imposter's head to Harule in Acarum.
Show the imposter's head to the people of Acarum.
Travel to Allemantheia and report to Fraya. [Speak with {@linkcreature:72#1103#Arshadh} to enter.]
